mapper.select: select order_id, shop_id, province_code, area_code, city_code, send_end_time, send_start_time, user_name, mobile, contact_phone, address, post_code from gd_shop_logistics where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.update:
update gd_shop_logistics
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},

post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
